results.title: Rockets: how they work
results.brief_description: Uses animated drawings and models to show how rockets achieve motion, and compares rocket power with other types of motive power. Scenes at a rocket launching site show the count-down procedure and the take-off of a giant multistage rocket. Demonstrates the functioning of a rocket guidance system.

results.title: Rocket range Australia
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Dept of the Interior, Shan Benson and W. H. Shepherd
results.brief_description: The Weapons Research Establishment at Salisbury and Woomera, South Australia. Shows the Salisbury Headquarters with its workshops, scientific testing of equipment, and wind tunnel. Also life in Woomera township and weapons research on the rocket range, including the engagement of a Jindivick pilotless aircraft by a Fireflash air-to-air missile and the launching of a skylark ground-to-air rocket.

results.title: Rocket man = Rocketman
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Caravan Pictures, Roger Birnbaum and Stuart Gillard
results.brief_description: Light-weight comedy about the first manned mission to Mars. Chaos rules when Fred Z. Randall (Harland Williams) is called in as a last minute replacement to join the team of specialists, including the efficient Julie Ford (Jessica Lundy) and the trained chimp Ulysses. The vague and geeky Randall blunders from one disaster to the next as the mission rockets its way to Mars but he wins out in the end when his navigational skills save the day. Filmed on location at Houston and the Johnson Space Center. Cast also includes William Sadler, Jeffrey DeMunn, Beau Bridges.

results.title: Rock U.S.A. Part 2
results.brief_description: Part two of a two-part series. Presents an overview of rock music throughout America featuring a strange mixture of artists including early footage of Blondie (Debra Harry) and raw and energetic performances by the Dead Boys, Heart, Mother’s Finest and Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes.

results.title: Rock pools: an introduction
results.creator_credit: Anvil Films and Record Group, Seabourne Enterprises and Donald Walton
results.brief_description: This film is a study of plants and animals whose structure and habits enable them to live in rock pools. The close association between plants and animals is illustrated. The ecology of rock pools is related to the rise and fall of the tide, heating and cooling, desiccation and flooding. Suitable for upper primary and lowere secondary levels.

results.title: Rock n' roll the greatest years: 1967 volume 2
results.brief_description: Relive some of the great hits of the year 1967, including; “Happy Jack” (The Who), “Autumn almanac” (The Kinks), “Zabadak” (Dave Dee Dozy Beaky Mick & Tich), “San Franciscan nights” (Eric Burdon), “Dedicated to the one I love” (Mamas & Papas), “Respect” (Aretha Franklin), “Mellow yellow” (Donovan), “Hole in my shoe” (Traffic), Soothe me” (Sam & Dave), “I can see for miles” (The Who), “I’m a man (The Spencer Davis Group), “The Wind cries Mary” (Jimi Hendrix experience), “Sweet soul music” (Arthur Conley) and “Creek alley” (Mamas & Papas).

results.title: Rock Hudson's home movies
results.brief_description: This documentary takes the film-clip biography to new heights. Narrated by ‘Rock’ it wittily dissects the late star’s screen career in the light of the now known facts of his life— that he was gay and died from AIDS. The film presents a new image of Hollywood’s leading romantic screen idol of the 50s and 60s by closely examining his screen roles for ‘hidden meanings’ Both poignant and funny it exposes the ‘queerness’ the sits just below the surface of mainstream Hollywood film.

results.title: Rock guitar: a guide from the greats
results.creator_credit: Longman Group, Eric Fellner and Simon Milne
results.brief_description: This entertaining documentary is a guide to how to play rock guitar, especially guitar licks. Features interviews and instructional segments with ace guitarists Ron Wood (Rolling Stones), Michael Schenker, Richard Thompson and John Wilson, as well as footage of Jimi Hendrix and Chuck Berry. Includes information on how to tune a guitar and play chords, right hand technique, polishing a rhythm or solo, and advice on choosing a guitar.

results.title: Rock engravings
results.brief_description: Aboriginal rock carvings in Western New South Wales are being studied by archaeologists to discover their significance and to throw light on the culture which produced them. The age of the carvings cannot be determined, but many may be thousands of years old.
